title: BRIEF-Orion Minerals Says Unit Granted Mining Right For Prieska Copper-Zinc Project In South Africa
text:
BRIEF-Orion Minerals Says Unit Granted Mining Right For Prieska Copper-Zinc Project In South Africa

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 03, 2019 01:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Orion Minerals Says Unit Granted Mining Right For Prieska Copper-Zinc Project In South Africa Sept 3 (Reuters) - Orion Minerals Ltd : * UNIT GRANTED MINING RIGHT FOR PRIESKA COPPER-ZINC PROJECT IN SOUTH AFRICA * MINING RIGHT IS VALID FOR AN INITIAL PERIOD OF 24 YEARS AND CAN BE RENEWED ON APPLICATION FOR FURTHER PERIODS

BRIEF-Orion Minerals Says Unit Granted Mining Right For Prieska Copper-Zinc Project In South Africa
description: BRIEF-Orion Minerals Says Unit Granted Mining Right For Prieska Copper-Zinc Project In South Africa
